participated in the first fire prevention and rescue drill
at Ben Thanh underground station
on Metro line No. 1 Ben Thanh Suoi
Tien in a hypothetical situation where the transformer station
encountered a problem.  A fire broke out in basement B1 of the Ben Thanh underground station,
leading to a power outage and
two trains stopping in the underground tunnel.
Toxic smoke from the fire poured out, engulfing the
entire station, causing
chaos among thousands of passengers during the transfer process.
Outside, there were 50 people who were injured due to jostling and pedaling.
Some people fainted and were
trapped due to collapsed building structures. The
fire prevention and fighting police
mobilized 159 specialized vehicles in
coordination with many related units.  It is very important to practice
firefighting and rescue activities to prepare
for bad situations and
emergency situations. It is very
important to practice regular plans to
improve your skills.  The team is ready to raise
awareness of coordination skills in
fire prevention and fighting and emergency rescue
when fires and explosions occur at works on the
metro line and Ben Thanh Metro station, and at the same
time improve command and management capacity.

this resort, people in
colorful traditional costumes climb up a
30m high log and dance in the air. This is a
tradition of indigenous residents in the
city of Chichicastenango,
140 kilometers from the capital Quala.  In the northwest number, dressed
in monkey and jaguar costumes, the
dancers climb up wooden trees to perform a
dance called Pao volador, Hanging themselves
suspended by ropes at the waist and
ankles and then rotate their heads around the
pole.  all to the rhythm of
indigenous musical instruments this dance is an
ancient custom dating back to pre-hispanic times
part of the
palo volador indigenous cosmic vision activities
is traditionally aimed at  honors the
patron saint of the indigenous Catholic Faith
as well as celebrates the winter solstice.
According to official sources,
it is believed that this dance was
originally performed to pray for good
weather and fertile land.  Vu fat is held in
many other places. In Guatemala and Mexico,
Guatemala has 22 Mayan ethnic groups

just by spending 20 Euro, lottery ticket buyers

about  325,000 EUR After deducting taxes
in the lottery broadcast

88008. Many people owned
this lucky lottery ticket, so we went to dinner
and bought three tickets.  Now I've won the lottery. It's
amazing that the ardo lottery started
in 1812 and became a tradition.
During the Christmas season in Spain, many
families, colleagues, friends, and groups
often buy and share these eight tickets
so that if  The god of luck knocks on the door and the joy will
multiply many times over. Finally, I
have money to return to see my family after 14
years in Spain. When I walked in,
everyone said we won the enado.
It's unbelievable.  According to the organizers, on
average each person spends about 70
Euros to buy Ordo Christmas lottery tickets. The total

This morning, on the
provincial road of Ho Chi Minh City, a
traffic accident occurred, killing one person. The
accident occurred at the exam area at
nearly 10:00 noon on the same day, Mr. Van
Phong.  39 years old, residing in Tan Uyen city,
Binh Duong province, driving a motorbike
on the provincial highway, from Binh
Duong to Cu Chi bridge, when the vehicle reached the section
passing Hoa Phu secondary school
in Hoa Phu commune, Cu Chi district.
collided with a truck traveling in the same direction. The
impact caused Mr. Phong to fall onto the
road and was run over by the truck's wheel. He
died on the spot where the accident occurred. The
road was under construction to upgrade and
expand the road surface with many  The day before, fabric B fell
in this area. There was also a
similar accident in which a woman

m teses Viet limited liability company.  Nam in
Ngai Giao town, Chau Duc district, Ba Ri Vung Tribe province.
According to initial information, at about
9:00 p.m., a fire was discovered at the
company's cotton warehouse because cotton is a flammable material,
so in just a few minutes the fire was contained.
Covering a large area of ​​the company,
nearly 200 officers and soldiers of the
fire prevention and rescue police force of
Ba Ria Vung Tau province and Chau Duc district
and 10 fire engines were dispatched
to the scene.  The authorities have
mobilized many means to break the quarantine
to prevent the fire from continuing to spread until
about 1:30 this morning. The fire was basically
controlled, with initial damage
estimated at about 30 billion VND.
The fire may have been caused by an electrical short circuit. It is
known that this 2,000 square meter cotton warehouse was
separated from the company's production
for about 6 hours. This morning, a truck carrying

Phuoc province When the vehicle arrived at the section of

VND is Bui Thi Thu Nguyet, 33 years old,

Van, 37 years old, residing in Hai Chau district,
Da Nang city. Police initially identified
Nguyet and  Van took advantage of the open mechanism

to open and operate more than 50 illegal

thereby making tens of billions of illegal profits.  The
